name: vDSP.Biquad
desc: A structure that applies biquadratic filters to single- and double-precision signals.

items.name: init?(coefficients: [Double], channelCount: vDSP_Length, sectionCount: vDSP_Length, ofType: T.Type)
items.desc: Initializes a new single or multichannel cascaded biquad IIR structure.

items.name: func apply<U>(input: U) -> [T]
items.desc: Applies a single- or double-precision single or multichannel biquad IIR filter, returning the filtered signal.

items.name: func apply<U, V>(input: U, output: inout V)
items.desc: Applies a single- or double-precision single or multichannel biquad IIR filter, overwriting the supplied output vector.
